properties.name: BaseWidgetMargin
properties.description: Generates space around the UI component.

properties.name: bottom
properties.description: Specifies the bottom margin of the UI component in pixels.

properties.name: left
properties.description: Specifies the left margin of the UI component in pixels.

properties.name: right
properties.description: Specifies the right margin of the UI component in pixels.

properties.name: top
properties.description: Specifies the top margin of the UI component in pixels.
